snippet: Starting on Tuesday readers will be able to use a new online companion to the Library of America's soon-to-be published two-volume collection, "American Science Fiction: Nine Classic Novels of the 1950s." The online component will offer additional...
abstract: Starting on Tuesday readers will be able to use a new online companion to the Library of America's soon-to-be published two-volume collection, "American Science Fiction: Nine Classic Novels of the 1950s." The online component will offer additional background and commentaries on the novels, as well as audio and video content and social-media interactivity.

headline.main: Classic Sci-Fi Novels Get Futuristic Enhancements From Library of America
